Question.Subject: Really really want to find a PDF for this sheet music?!?
Question.Content: I have been trying to find a FREE printable PDF file for Taylor Swift's "FOREVER AND ALWAYS PIANO VERSION." I cannot find it ANYWHERE! please help me! i need it to be a PDF cause everything else I either (A) have to download it which my parents DO NOT want me to do, (B) sign up for some blog thingy, or (C) pay for it
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi,
I have hosted the pdf file for you here it is a free download. http://www.4shared.com/file/234678959/2a64cbea/forever_always_sheet_piano.html

Answer.Content: Then dont limit yourself to a PDF file.

Hi,
I have hosted the pdf file for you here it is a free download. http://www.4shared.com/file/234678959/2a64cbea/forever_always_sheet_piano.html
